name: sessionbuddy
description: Chrome extension for managing cookie stores

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && vite build && npm run post-build
scripts.post-build: cp src/popup.html dist/ && sed -i '' 's/\.\//assets\//g; s/\.ts/.js/g' dist/popup.html && cp manifest.json background.js content-script.js session-buddy.html main.html redirect.js set-background-color.js settings.js settings.html dist/ && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r assets/* dist/assets/ && cp src/assets/main.css dist/assets/ && mkdir -p dist/_locales/en && cp _locales/en/messages.json dist/_locales/en/
